Definition at line 846 of file __init__.py.

Member Function Documentation

def Plurk::oauth2::SignatureMethod_PLAINTEXT::sign (   self,
  request,
  consumer,
  token 
) 
Returns the signature for the given request, based on the consumer
and token also provided.

You should use your implementation of `signing_base()` to build the
message to sign. Otherwise it may be less useful for debugging.

Reimplemented from Plurk::oauth2::SignatureMethod.

Definition at line 858 of file __init__.py.

def Plurk::oauth2::SignatureMethod_PLAINTEXT::signing_base (   self,
  request,
  consumer,
  token 
) 
Concatenates the consumer key and secret with the token's
secret.

Reimplemented from Plurk::oauth2::SignatureMethod.
